title: pollAp-puliyinum
sahitya:
pollAp-puliyinum pollAk-kodiyan ennai bhuvi tanil En paDaittAi shambhO


anupallavi

  nallOraik-kanAvilum naNuga mATTEn nalladu shonnAlum kETka mATTEn


caraNam    un nAmam en nAvAlum shollamATTEn uLLezhum kAma krOda madam koLLamATTEn
ennALum mUvAsaiyai vella mATTEn en aiyan un AlayattuL shella mATTEn
